Tolkien-related events that took place in 1903.

content.title: February
content.content: 16 - Norman Shelley, who would voice Gandalf and Tom Bombadil in the first radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings, is born.

content.title: December
content.content: Christmas - J.R.R. Tolkien takes his First Communion, and buys a copy of Chambers's Etymological Dictionary.

content.title: Autumn
content.content: ? - J.R.R. Tolkien wins a Foundation Scholarship to King Edward's School, and returns there to continue his studies.

? - Stella M. Mills, student under J.R.R. Tolkien, is born.
Years
1900 1901 1902 1903 1904 1905 1906
